challenges.name: Spend gas on PGN (Public Goods Network)â€”more gas is better!
challenges.description: The more gas you use on PGN compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get. This means you can still get more XP if you execute fewer bigger transactions!

challenges.name: Increase your Gitcoin Passport score
challenges.description: The more you increase your Gitcoin Passport score in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Spend gas using the CyberWallet associated with your address
challenges.description: The more gas you use with your CyberWallet across networks compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Mint W3ST
challenges.description: The more W3ST you mint, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Collect post essence
challenges.description: The more post essence you collect, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Interact with unique contracts on Base
challenges.description: The more interactions you execute with different unique contracts on Base compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Vampire Attack: Bridge funds from Arbitrum
challenges.description:
Bridge ETH or USDC from Arbitrum to Base using Hop Exchange. 
 
Accepted assets: [ETH](https://app.hop.exchange/#/send?sourceNetwork=arbitrum&destNetwork=base) and [USDC](https://app.hop.exchange/#/send?sourceNetwork=arbitrum&destNetwork=base&token=USDC), bridging anything else won't be counted towards XP 
 
Mechanics: The more you bridge, the higher the reward. 
 
Reward: Each 1 dollar bridged from Arbitrum to Base will be worth 10 contract interactions.

challenges.name: Interact with unique contracts on Arbitrum
challenges.description: The more interactions you execute with different unique contracts on Arbitrum compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Earn fUSDC rewards using Fluidity
challenges.description: The more fUSDC rewards you earn using Fluidity in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Interact with unique contracts on zkSync
challenges.description: The more interactions you execute with different unique contracts on zkSync compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Claim OATs during the week
challenges.description: The more OATs you claim across networks compared to other members of this realm in a week, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Claim NFTs during the week using the Galxe space station
challenges.description: The more NFTs you claim via a Galxe [`SpaceStation` contract](https://docs.galxe.com/developer/smart-contract/contracts/spacestation/), the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.

challenges.name: Claim bribes on Votemarket
challenges.description: Earn $XP by voting for gauges and claiming bribes if available.

challenges.name: Bridge tokens using FraxFerry
challenges.description: The more unique tokens you bridge over FraxFerry, the more of the weekly XP drop you will get.
